## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G17820](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G17820)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PER57</u>
- **Gene Name:** Peroxidase 57
- **Description:**   Peroxidase superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Plant Ontology Annotations:
   - [PO:0009005](https://browser.planteome.org/amigo/term/PO:0009005)&nbsp;---&nbsp;root&nbsp;---&nbsp;raíz (Spanish, exact), radices (exact, plural), radix (exact), 根 (Japanese, exact), aerial root (narrow), climbing root (narrow)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [ohy1 ]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Increased peroxidase activity leading tin increased resistance to pathogens, induction of defense response gene expression and increased leaf cuticle permeability.
